item.title: Credits
item.description: Previous productions include Click on a production’s title to be taken to the appropriate gallery page Lighting Designer May-23 | Agrippina | dir. Ashley Pearson | Jackson’s Lane Theatre, London Mar-23 | Acid’s Reign | Relish Theatre | dir. Luke Howarth | VAULT Festival, London Mar-23 | Five Years With The White Man | dir. Sam Rayner | King’s Head Theatre, London, and VAULT Festival, London Feb-23 | SNAIL | dir.
